sentences.sContent: Why did Ford's accelerator always have an accidental failure on acclivity?
sentences.sContent_eng: Why did Ford's accelerator always have an accidental failure on acclivity?
sentences.sCn: 为什么福特的加速器在斜坡上总是有意外的出错？

trans.tranCn: 向上的斜坡；[建] 上斜
trans.tranOther: an upward slope, esp of the ground
